R

RegisterHandler - Class in <Unnamed>
Register Class, used to connect and query the database the check if the request username/email the user wishes to register, also provides functionality to insert the requested user into the database.
RegisterHandler() - Constructor for class RegisterHandler
 
RegisterServlet - Class in <Unnamed>
Register Servlet is used to collect the user submitted form data and call various methods to validate the data.
RegisterServlet() - Constructor for class RegisterServlet
 
RegisterUser(String, String, String, String, String) - Static method in class RegisterHandler
Method RegisterUser, used to register requested user into the database, the user has already been validated, so we know it's safe to insert the user into the database.
